title: TikTok creators inspire young people to quit vaping to protest cobalt mining
description: Steven Romo reports on a social media trend that has inspired young people to quit vaping. Digital creators have brought attention to the humanitarian risks involved with mining cobalt, a key element found in vaping devices.

title: Teenage surfer dies after shark attack off southern Australia
description: A teenage surfer has died in the third fatal shark attack to take place in waters off South Australia state in recent months.

title: 'Family is decimated' after avalanche kills 2 skiers and injures another on Mont Blanc, official says
description: An avalanche on Mont Blanc swept two skiers to their deaths and left another injured, while a hiker was killed on another slope in the French Alps, according to local authorities.

title: Russian missile strikes in Odesa kill at least three people
description: Russia unleashed a barrage of missile strikes across Ukraine, killing at least 12 people and injuring many, according to Ukrainian officials.

title: "Almost naked" party at a Moscow nightclub has triggered fierce backlash
description: An "almost naked" party at a Moscow nightclub has triggered a fierce backlash, with pro-war lawmakers, propagandists and military bloggers accusing those who attended of moral corruption. A rapper who attended with only a sock covering his modesty got sentenced to 15 days in jail.

title: With all eyes on Gaza and Ukraine, a slew of other conflicts could erupt in 2024
description: With the world’s eyes on the wars in Gaza and Ukraine, an unprecedented number of potentially “catastrophic” conflicts are going under the radar, analysts say.

title: IDF says it ‘regrets’ harming uninvolved Gazans amid strike on refugee camp
description: Israel’s military is acknowledging individuals were hit in a Christmas Eve strike on a central Gaza refugee camp, which the Hamas-run Gaza health ministry said killed at least 70 people. The IDF says it “regrets the harm to uninvolved individuals.” NBC News’ Josh Lederman has the latest.

title: Iranians defying their government though viral dance and joy campaign
description: Iranians are taking to the streets dancing in a viral moment ignited on social media that is defying their government. DJ Sonami said “it’s a great feeling” to make people so joyful.
